name: Grumpig

passive.name: Heart of a Gamer
passive.effect: Grumpig has the Heart of a Gamer.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If Heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Gamer Blast
attacks.effect: If Grumpig and the Defending Pokemon have the same number of Energies attached to them, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

flavor: These grown hogs haven't forgotten their gamer roots.
